TEXT.English: When checked, includes the Civilopedia text after the quote for the discovered technology.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, includes the Civilopedia text after the quote for the discovered technology.

TEXT.English: Determines the view to display when you discover a technology.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Original[COLOR_REVERT] - Default minimal Civ4 view.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Detailed[COLOR_REVERT] - Adds more detailed information.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wide[COLOR_REVERT] - Wider version of the Detailed view.
TEXT.Chinese: Determines the view to display when you discover a technology.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Original[COLOR_REVERT] - Default minimal Civ4 view.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Detailed[COLOR_REVERT] - Adds more detailed information.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wide[COLOR_REVERT] - Wider version of the Detailed view.
